subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: This year, four older, smaller maxis have been given a berth in the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup as a nod to tradition, in a class called Spirit of Tradition.
snippet: This year, four older, smaller maxis have been given a berth in the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup as a nod to tradition, in a class called Spirit of Tradition.
